title: "Robo-Art Wallpapers"
content: Welcome to our website, where you can find a collection of minimalist wallpapers featuring futuristic robotic designs. Our wallpapers are perfect for those who appreciate the beauty of simplicity and want to add a touch of modernity to their desktop or mobile device. With our dark and moody color schemes, our wallpapers will give your device a sleek and sophisticated look. Whether you're a fan of science fiction or simply love the aesthetic of robots, our collection has something for everyone. Browse through our selection and download your favorite wallpaper today!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a minimalist illustration of a robotic arm, against a background of dark and moody colors."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
